snippet: A Greek magistrate ordered that the oligarch Lavrentis Lavrentiadis, who was arrested on charges of embezzlement and fraud, be remanded to custody after visiting the 40-year-old businessman in an Athens hospital.
abstract: Greek magistrate orders that oligarch Lavrentis Lavrentiadis, who faces charges of embezzlement and fraud, be remanded to custody after visiting 40-year-old businessman in an Athens hospital.
lead_paragraph: A Greek magistrate ordered that the oligarch Lavrentis Lavrentiadis, who was arrested on charges of embezzlement and fraud, be remanded to custody after visiting the 40-year-old businessman in an Athens hospital.

headline.main: Greece: Oligarch Under Arrest Expected to Be Moved to Prison
headline.print_headline: Greece: Oligarch Under Arrest Is Moved to Psychiatric Hospital
